sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 9 meters and a height of 5 meters. What is the area of the parallelogram?
message_2:
The area of a parallelogram can be calculated using the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 9 meters and the height is 5 meters. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 9 meters × 5 meters = 45 square meters
